events.name: Premium Open Class Experience - October
events.subtitle: October 22, 2020
events.theEvent:
Have you wondered what our Premium Interview-practice classes are like? 

This is a pretty popular service we offer at VanHack Premium. It’s a great opportunity to improve your interview skills, network, and also your English grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation, and confidence. Our Premium candidates absolutely love it!  


Come and join this FREE OPEN CLASS EXPERIENCE at 4 AM and 8 AM (PST)! Get a little taste of VH Premium.
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Webinar event on October 22 in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.

events.name: Four steps to increase your chances to get hired
events.subtitle: November 3, 2020
events.theEvent:
Fernanda Reis will share valuable tips to help you get the best out of VanHack and find your job abroad.

If you want to learn how to navigate your way through VanHack and get hired, you can’t miss it.

She has reviewed tons of profiles before and will share all the insights that work EVERY TIME. VanHack allows you to make specific searches to match you with a job that you would enjoy and succeed at. The results will point you to available positions much closer aligned to your desires. Don’t waste time filling out a bunch of applications to places you are only semi-interested in. Instead, take the time to figure out the type of position you would really enjoy.


Join this FREE WEBINAR at 9AM (PST)!
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Webinar event on November 3 in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.

events.name: Virtual Hiring Event - DevOps
events.subtitle: November 23 - December 11, 2020
events.theEvent:
VanHack is doing a Virtual Hiring Event to connect the best DevOps professionals with some of Canada and Europe's fastest-growing companies.

If you are a DevOps looking to get hired abroad, that's the opportunity you were looking for.

What candidates are we looking for?

  • 4+ years of experience in a DevOps and/or SRE role
  • Experience with Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform or Microsoft Azure 
  • Experience with orchestration tools like Docker, Kubernetes
  • Experience in scripting languages 
  • Familiar with Linux, Scrum and Agile methodologies
  • Eagerness to learn and share your knowledge 
  • Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related
  • Verified English on your VanHack Profile (Advanced or Fluent)

Nice to have: Good results in the coding challenge 

The Event Process

  • Application for the event starts now and we recommend you complete all the mandatory steps (profile and English) within one week after your application. The faster you do it, the higher your chances to be reviewed by a hiring company
  • VanHack will accept companies and job descriptions until November 20th
  • According to the job requirements, VanHack recruiters will analyze your profile and if your skills and experience are matching, we will share your profile with the companies
  • Candidates with a confirmed interview will receive a private session with an advisor from VanHack to prepare them for the actual interview
  • Interviews with the companies will mostly happen between November 23rd - December 11th
  • Every update on your process will be shared by email. Pay attention to your inbox and make sure you whitelist the vanhack.com domain
  • Don't feel discouraged if you don't receive a call from a recruiter. It is not necessarily due to your profile, but companies can be looking for a different skillset

Preparation

  • Candidates will receive Preparation such as classes, webinars and online courses
  • Some companies will be available for live Q&A sessions to answer all your questions. 
  • Private session with an advisor from VanHack to prepare you for the actual interview

Logistics during the event

  • If a company selects your profile, we will inform you immediately and will schedule the interview 
  • You need to book a Mock Interview as soon as possible after you've been informed of your selection
  • Company Interviews will be held from November 23rd - 11th December
  • You do not need to block off your calendar for the entire weeks. You only need to attend the mock interview and then the actual interview
  • You will be informed about each interview [Mock and Actual] at least 48 hours in advance


If you have any questions, send an email to contact@vanhack.com.
events.theCandidates:
VanHack is looking for candidates with 3 or more years of professional experience.

Candidates also need to have advanced or fluent English and be able to attend the Virtual Hiring Fair event on 23 until 11 December in person.

Most importantly, candidates must be willing to get a job in Canada and/or Europe, and to relocate in the second semester of 2020.
